name: XANDO: Xtreme & Over the Top
description:
This game is in early access and is being updated frequently. If you have any questions, feedback, or suggestions, please feel free to contact us!

XANDO is a turn-based strategy game that unleashes the true potential of Tic-Tac-Toe. It's the most excited you will ever be about Tic-Tac-Toe!!!

In the future, corporations control all aspects of life. They battle for control of the market and to settle their personal beef on a global stage in XANDO, the sports sensation of the future. Conquer the corporate landscape as one of 4 eccentric CEO's by completing boards and reducing your opponent's corporate trust (HP) down to 0! No one said you had to play fair though! So turn the tides of tile-placing battle in your favor with the help of one of the 4 rule-bending ability decks. From laying traps to [i[b]]demolish[/b][/i] your opponent's trust to distorting the natural flow of play, victory is yours for the taking!

Features:
• Dominate the market as one of 4 eccentric CEO's
• Break the normal rules of play with 4 ability decks
• Play through a story of petty squabbles between corporate powerhouses to see who makes ALL the money (because some just isn't enough) (Not in Early Access)
• Battle against your friends with online play or local play
• Hone your skills by competing against an AI
• Show your true colors by selecting alternate color schemes for your tiles
